about_the_game:
The Dragons Catacomb Demo
Introduction

The First piece of the puzzle is here. Experience some of the key features and story introduction in this thrilling Demo!

Your mission is here. You must navigate through the dark catacombs and dungeons to reach the Castle. With its many and mighty protectors, your task is not an easy one. Stealth, combat, climbing and jumping, as well as mind bending and quick thinking are essential for your success. Time to bring out all your skills on the table!

Contents

5 Challenges. 5 Skills.

The Demo will contain of 5 Levels in total. Each is seamlessly connected and each will showcase a different part of the game and fill in the story. From sneaking around from the big bad beast, to opening ancient graves and unleashing curses. This demo is packed to the brim, and is an accurate representation of the final vision for Cosmic Horizons!

Features

Immersion, in every way.

Every little detail was looked over in this showcase. From visuals, sounds, interactions, and pure gameplay, we wanted to showcase and offer the actual "release" game experience. Here are some of the top features in this demo:
  • Stunning graphical detail
  • Immersive Gameplay and Feedback
  • Real-time Dynamic illumination
  • Atmospheric Environment
  • Intriguing story and challenges
  • Intense and satisfying PvE Combat


February

The Demo will be released in February. We can't wait to give the players this experience and the result of our hard work to make good games. With this Demo, we begin. To finish with saying that we truly hope you will enjoy this Demo and even more to hear your feedback on it!

Cosmic Horizons is going strong with the development, so make sure to follow us to not miss the news and announcements about the game! With the Official Release Date is yet to be announced, and upcoming trailers and screenshots that we will regularly update on the Store page!

  • VR Support: NO
  • Additional Notes: SSD preferred

  • VR Support: NO
